document.p: Remote assistance allows you to grant access to your from the Internet.
document.step1: Under Mode, click either of the following:
document.li2:
Permanent:
The remote sessions ends when the technical support disables remote assistance or after restarting your .

Temporary:
The remote sessions ends when the technical support disables remote assistance, after restarting your or after 30 minutes of inactivity.
document.step1: Specify the password in either if the following ways:
document.li2: Click the Use Random Password check box, to let the generate a password.
Clear the Use Random Password check box and enter the password of your choice in the Password box.
document.h4: How to access the from the Internet
document.step1: Open your web browser and browse to https://<WAN IP>:<Port> (for example, https://131.141.151.161:55174), where:
document.li2: <WAN IP> is the WAN IP address displayed in the Internet Access card.
<Port> is the prot number displayed in the Management tab.
document.step1: Your browser may prompt you that it does not recognize the security certificate. If so, indicate that you want to continue.

The Sign in page appears. Enter the user name and password displayed in the Management card.
If you did not choose a random password when enabling remote assistance, enter the password that you provided instead.

You can now access your from the Internet via link listed under URL. When you enter the URL you will prompted for a user name and password. Enter the user name (normally assist) and password listed on the Management page
